title: .NET Versioning
description: Understanding .NET version numbers for the runtime, SDK, and targeting packs. Even-numbered releases (.NET 6, 8, 10) are Long-Term Support (LTS) with 3 years of support; odd-numbered releases are Standard-Term Support (STS) with 18 months. Use `global.json` to pin SDK versions in projects.
shortDescription: Version numbers, LTS/STS releases, and SDK version pinning.
